text: Mark Walter Harris (22 August 1947 – 15 January 2020) was an Australian professional rugby league player. He played as a centre. He played for the Eastern Suburbs (1970–79) and the North Sydney Bears (1980–81). He also played Canadian football for the Montreal Alouettes in the Canadian Football League. He was born in Brisbane, Queensland. Harris died of throat cancer on 15 January 2020. He was 72. ==References== ==Other websites== *Mark Harris at Rugby League Project Category:2020 deaths Category:1947 births Category:Australian rugby league players Category:Deaths from throat cancer Category:Montreal Alouettes players Category:Rugby league players from Brisbane
title: Mark Harris (rugby league)
